coreAtributes.name: Aketon
coreAtributes.description: A heavy-duty jacket made of thick, quilted cloth. Designed to be worn beneath armour, the aketon is also a very stylish piece of clothing all on its lonesome, and offers reasonable protection from physical assault, besides.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unlace the back of your Aketon, and remove it.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unlace the back of [npc.name]'s Aketon, and remove it.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear open [npc.name]'s Aketon, and haul it off.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] unlaces the back of their Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] unlaces the back of your Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears open your Aketon, and hauls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] unlaces the back of [npc2.name]'s Aketon, and removes it.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] tears open [npc2.name]'s Aketon, and hauls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You don your Aketon, and lace up the back.
replacementText.playerNPC: You assist [npc.name] in donning their Aketon, and lace up its back.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly shove [npc.name] into their Aketon, and lace it up.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] dons their Aketon, and laces up the back.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] assists you in donning oyur Aketon, and laces it up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] shoves you into your Aketon, and laces it up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] assists [npc2.name] in donning their Aketon, and laces up the back.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] shoves [npc2.name] into their Aketon, and laces it up.
